name: SCNGeometryPrimitiveType
desc: The drawing primitive that connects vertices when rendering a geometry element, used by the primitiveType property to specify how SceneKit interprets the geometry element’s data.

items.name: case triangles
items.desc: The geometry element’s data is a sequence of triangles, with each triangle described by three new vertices.

items.name: case triangleStrip
items.desc: The geometry element’s data is a sequence of triangles, with each triangle described by one new vertex and two vertices from the previous triangle.

items.name: case line
items.desc: The geometry element’s data is a sequence of line segments, with each line segment described by two new vertices.

items.name: case point
items.desc: The geometry element’s data is a sequence of unconnected points.
